item.title: The Mandelbrot set in R
item.description: This being my first post to Dandelbrot.com, I thought it only fitting to post something about the Mandelbrot set. I determined to code up a mandelbrot set fractal generator in R. After a little digging I came across this R-bloggers post from 2014. I figured, rather than reinvent the wheel, I might as well just borrow code from here, with all due kutos to Myles Harrison, the original author.
